Combat
Hit Points: 18 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Beak (+9 1d6 P; dexterity; expert); Cruuk (+5 1d6 B R30'; strength; expert); Scythe (+5 1d10 S [Crit +d10]; strength; expert); Talons (+9 1d4 S/P; dexterity; expert); Warhammer (+5 1d8 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Jinx Glutton: Has increased Eat Fortune effects
Sharp Beak: Beak inflicts 1d6 HP piercing
Taloned Tengu: Talons inflict 1d4 HP slashing
Dogtooth Tengu: Beak has deadly d8 trait
Eat Fortune: (R) R60' Counteracts a fortune or misfortune effects once per hr
Harbinger's Claw: (R) R60' Inflicts the worse of two rolls on the triggering attack or skill check
Magpie Snatch: (2) Picks up an object while Striding twice
One-Toed Hop: (1) Makes a vertical Leap without triggering reactions
Point Blank Stance: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Soaring Flight: (1) Flies 20' once per rd
Stormtossed Tengu: Ignores target concealment from rain or fog
Tengu Weapon Familiarity: Can gain familiarity with a possessed sword during daily prep/Has access to uncommon tengu weapons
Tengu Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Tengu Weapons; Katana; Khakkara; Temple Sword; Wakizashi)
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Jinxed Tengu: Successful saves vs. curses are critical successes, and a successful DC 17 flat check reduces a doomed condition by 1
Skyborn Tengu: Takes no damage from falls
Stormtossed Tengu: Has resistance 1 to electricity
Magic
Attack: Primal Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Aerial Form (P4): (2) Self becomes a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 19, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Acrobatics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Acrobatics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 22, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Acrobatics)
Cursed Metamorphosis (P6): (2) R30' Transforms the target's form into a harmless animal for 1 min, allowing a new save to revert each rd (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure transforms permanently and also affects the target's mind)
Electric Arc (PC1): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d4+undefined electricity on 1 or 2 targets (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Gust Of Wind (P1): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against the wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning)
Ignition (PC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 2d4 HP (2d6 HP if a melee attack) fire, or double HP plus 1d4 HP persistent fire on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Lightning Bolt (P3): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Vitality Lash (PC1): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d6+undefined HP positive on an undead target (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Wind (P3): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x30'x5' wind wall that blocks small ammunition, inflicts -2 attack on larger ammunition, inflicts difficult terrain, and blocks flying creatures for 1 min (save Fortitude (flying creature) allows passage as difficult terrain; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a 10' push)
Magic Notes:
Mariner's Fire: Knows the Ignition primal innate cantrip; can cast it at will
Mountainkeeper Tengu: Knows the Vitality Lash primal innate cantrip; can cast it at will
Storm's Lash: Knows the Electric Arc primal innate cantrip; can cast it at will
Tengu Feather Fan: Knows the Gust Of Wind primal spell
Thunder God's Fan: Knows the Lightning Bolt primal spell; can cast it using feather fan at 5th rank/+1 feather fan use per day
Trickster Tengu: Knows the Aerial Form and Cursed Metamorphosis primal innate spells; can cast one of the once per day at 7th rank
Wind God's Fan: Knows the Wall Of Wind primal spell; can cast it using feather fan at 3rd rank/+1 feather fan use per day
Great Tengu Form: Gains the benefits of 5 min Enlarge and Fly while in Long-Nosed form
Long-Nosed Form: (1) Becomes a human with tengu-like features
Mountainkeeper Tengu: Can cast tengu-acquired spells as divine or primal spells
